English Version right here:

@lista_dao  just did something great today — breaking the monopoly @VenusProtocol has held for years over $BNB lending. The people have suffered under Venus long enough.

Venus, knowing they had no real competitors, once intentionally tweaked their interest rate model for BNB lending as soon as they saw more users borrowing BNB for launches.

How steep was it?

5% → 29.68%

Yup, at a certain utilization level, borrowing just 1 more BNB could cause the interest rate to 6x for everyone. Crazy, right?

It’s like a tourist spot suddenly pump ticket prices because too many people showed up: “take it or leave it.”

Thanks to this BNB lending monopoly, the Venus team basically stopped innovating and just sat back collecting yield from users borrowing to ape into launchpads. Like some kind of DeFi couch potato living off their parents (aka retail users).

But as Binance launchpad returns have been drying up lately, borrowing $BNB to participate has become a net negative for most users. The game was rigged.

Today though, @lista_dao launched their own BNB lending pool, capping interest at just 12.7%.

Everyone in my wechat group immediately started moving over, and within minutes, Venus’s BNB borrow rate dropped to 5% 😂😂😂

Wouldn’t be surprised if Venus has to revert their rate curve soon — otherwise, no one’s gonna stick around.

All in all, this feels like a healthy step forward for the recovery of BNB Chain. Love to see it.

check this out, bro @DePINDegens

今天Lista是干了一件大好事的，打破了 @VenusProtocol 过去几年来在 $BNB 借贷上的垄断，百姓苦Venus久也。

Venus仗着没有竞争对手，眼看借 $BNB 打新的人多两年前专门修改了借贷曲线，只要超过了一定的借贷数量费率就会出现跳涨，有多陡峭？

5%->29.68%

到了某条线，只要借多1个bnb，全体借贷人利息直接翻6倍，刺激不？

这真的跟景区看到游人多了门票翻3倍爱买不买。靠着垄断BNB借贷生意，整个Venus团队过去几年几乎没有任何进展，就躺平了靠打新拔毛这一口饭过日子，跟啃老族一样一样的。

随着币安过去一段时间打新收益越来越低，借币打新几乎已经变成反撸。

但今天 @lista_dao 开了借贷池，且封顶借贷费率才12.7% , 刚才群友们忙着搬家，瞬间把Venus的借贷利率搬到了5% 😂😂😂 。

估计用不了多久Venus又要把借贷曲线改回来了，不然没人陪他玩了要。

这也是bnbchain复苏的一个积极信号吧，挺好的

DPM/FM underscored the government’s desire in developing sound regulatory framework for crypto and blockchain mechanisms in Pakistan.

Mr. Zhao expressed his strong commitment to addressing the challenge of out-of-school children through digital education platforms which was welcomed by DPM/FM and his team. 

DPM/FM further highlighted the government’s focus on advancing pragmatic, forward-looking policies aimed at fostering a robust digital economy in Pakistan.

今天我们很高兴为大家带来《Hash Global BNB估值报告》——这是Hash Global BNB价值分析系列的第五篇🎉

自2019年起，Hash Global 便前瞻性地看好BNB作为跨周期持有的价值投资标的，并率先构建了基于货币方程式的估值模型。此后三年，我们看到币安生态高速扩张，推动BNB快速实现了我们当初的价格预测。

近年，币安经历了内部调整与阶段性蛰伏。但自2025年起，我们观察到币安已显著转变“守势”状态：在美国政策态度转向与行业迈入关键发展期的背景下，币安创始人及团队在链上技术、交易所运营、产品功能与玩法模式等方面持续发力、不断创新。

我们认为，币安生态近期的高速发展正为BNB带来全新的价值重估契机。基于对生态现状的最新理解（搭配《超越比特币，BNB 何以成为加密市场的隐形赢家？》https://t.co/p8Bh0w8cVY一起食用更佳），我们在本期报告中对BNB的合理估值已上调至2000美元以上，较当前价格仍有近三倍上行空间，市值有望突破3000亿美元，甚至超越以太坊。

Let’s dive in⬇️🧵.

共创感谢 🎉 @ARSHenry1 @longwinsk @Walter_JCHuang @HashGlobal_R

I received hundreds of messages through https://t.co/OUOEuB6PYR, which I find incredibly helpful. However, many don't know how to communicate effectively with busy, impatient people like me. Here are some tips.

1. State your ask in the first sentence.

Start by clearly stating your request, like seeking investment, so I know what to focus on immediately. Don’t start with an intro, background, description, and only make an ask in the end. I won’t know what to read for.

2. Make your ask explicit.

Many add vague asks like “would like your support” or “collaboration.” I wouldn’t know what you want. But if you say, “we are raising $500k at a $5m valuation,” it’s clear.

3. Make it concise.

Long messages are easy but show an unorganized mind. Short, concise writing is harder but easier for the reader.

4. Ask precise questions.

Avoid broad questions like "What do you think about the crypto industry?" I address those in media interviews, so searching online for answers is better. Open-ended questions are tough to answer repeatedly.

5. Don’t waste money.

I won’t tell you which coin to buy.
I won’t evaluate a project for you.
I won’t interact with your meme coin just because you asked.
I won’t jump on a call.
I won’t give you crypto. I donate in bulk, but I can’t verify that you aren't a scammer individually.
I won’t follow you just because you asked. It may come naturally.
...

6. If you want to recommend a project to me, you can write concisely why it is good, I will read it.

7. I would greatly appreciate any valuable feedback you may give me, and I will even pay you back.

8. I am looking for builders who can build. I am looking for talent.

Our industry is in a messy state.

Lots of money chasing quick profits, wanting overnight 10x, 100x returns. When they can't find these, they complain.

On the other end of the spectrum, real builders feel left out. They can't achieve 10x overnight. Building real tangible value takes time.

When others see problems, we see opportunities. Let's help builders build.

@BNBChain, @yzilabs, and @CoinMarketCap have been working tirelessly behind the scenes to gather 16 strong projects to our Most Valuable Builder (MVB) Accelerator Program Season 9. They span AI, DeFi, DePin, DeSci, entertainment, and infra.

Not that I have much to offer, but I will try my best to be a good mentor.

Build!

Meet the next wave of builders shaping Web3.

From AI agents to real-world asset platforms, the #MVB9 cohort is packed with innovation, in partnership with @CoinMarketCap & @yzilabs.

Kyrgyzstan🇰🇬
Crypto adoption, one country at a time.
Also brought a Head of State to X.

A Memorandum of Understanding has been signed between the National Investment Agency under the President of the Kyrgyz Republic
and Changpeng Zhao (CZ)
 
In accordance with the Memorandum, the parties intend to cooperate in the development of the cryptocurrency and blockchain technology ecosystem in the Kyrgyz Republic. This includes providing infrastructural, technological support, technical expertise, and consulting services on cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies, as well as implementing educational initiatives.
The signing of the Memorandum opens new horizons for the development of digital technologies and the blockchain ecosystem in the country. This cooperation marks an important step towards strengthening technological infrastructure, implementing innovative solutions, and preparing highly qualified specialists in blockchain technologies, virtual asset management, and cybersecurity.
In light of the rapid global evolution of digital technologies, such initiatives are crucial for the sustainable growth of the economy and the security of virtual assets, ultimately generating new opportunities for businesses and society as a whole.
 
Changpeng Zhao (CZ) is a Chinese-Canadian entrepreneur who founded Binance, the world’s leading crypto exchange. CZ is a leading expert in the field of cryptocurrency and blockchain technologies.
 
Подписан Меморандум о взаимопониманиимежду Национальным агентством по инвестициям при Президенте Кыргызской Республики и Чанпэн Чжао (CZ)
 
В соответствии с Меморандумом стороны намерены сотрудничать по развитию экосистемы криптовалют и блокчейн-технологий в Кыргызской Республике. Речь идет об оказанииинфраструктурной, технологической поддержки, технической экспертизы и консультаций по криптовалютам и блокчейн-технологиям, а также реализации образовательных инициатив.
Подписание Меморандума открывает новые горизонты для развития цифровых технологий и блокчейн-экосистемы в стране. Это сотрудничество знаменует собой важный шаг к укреплению технологической инфраструктуры, внедрению инновационных решений и подготовке высококвалифицированных специалистов в области блокчейн-технологий, управления виртуальными активами и кибербезопасности. 
В условиях стремительного глобального развития цифровых технологий, подобные инициативы становятся ключевыми для устойчивого роста экономики и обеспечения безопасности виртуальных активов, что создаст новые возможности для бизнеса и общества в целом.
Чанпэн Чжао (CZ) - китайско-канадский предприниматель, основатель крупнейшей в мире криптовалютной биржи Binance. CZ является ведущим экспертом в области криптовалют и блокчейн-технологий.

While most of the L1 chain tokens have dropped after the recent market crash, BNB has shown relative strength.

The strength is tied to the activity in BNBchain and the growth of $BNB usage.

Looking at on-chain data, and what led to growth, we can understand how this happened:

• BNBchain's incentive programs, such as the recent $100M liquidity incentive program for listing on centralized exchanges, directly aligned more builders to launch on BNBchain.

https://t.co/O2Su0LwTKH

• And the weekly liquidity support program to increase the liquidity of BNBchain pairs:

https://t.co/Rf5Wnz4DzU

• Meanwhile, a permissionless launchpad called Fourmeme has seen a massive uptick in growth, led by several tokens directly listed on Binance after launching from the platform.

https://t.co/TvixFsHlwV

• While the surge in activity is very apparent on the meme coins side, that wasn't the only focus of BNBchain. BNB AI Hack is one of the many programs co-led by BNBchain and other sponsor builders of the chain.

https://t.co/VS5SUCT8Nq

• In the meantime, @cz_binance's active participation in the community—in his own words, "cheerleading 😅"—has been growing the chain's spirit and making more builders and community members place their bets on BNBchain again.

https://t.co/nZnQ4xtL3u

Supporting the builders of BNBchain significantly impacts $BNB's performance, as can be seen from the latest relative strength created.

A new era is starting on BNBchain that is visible by all means.

18 days ago, I published an article in Binance Square on a Pay to Reach idea. A few days later, a developer messaged me with a working prototype. After some discussions, adjustments, and a security review,   

Yesterday, the product was live. I updated my X profile description last night.

Immediately, I was spammed at the initial price to 0.04 BNB ($24) per message, "yo", "how was your dinner", "check out this meme coin", "which CA?". I can't reply to these types of messages. Please don't waste your money like that.

Then I set the price to 0.1 BNB, but I still woke up with 100+ messages. I have since moved the price to 0.2 BNB, about $120. I will adjust the price to try to hit a sweet spot of about 10 messages per day. I'm not sure if that's even possible.  

Most of the messages I have received are too short or include big questions like "how do I run a successful start-up? " These are hard to respond to.  

I recommend reading https://t.co/umKPjnORZc 

I put this link on the site where they have to write the message to me, but it's clear 95% of the people never read it.

Please don't message me after you see this point. I'm not sure if the server can handle all the traffic. Please read the communication tips, learn the recipient's (my) style, and message effectively. 🙏

For all the fees or donations in BNB I receive on my public address, I will donate or use them to help BSC community projects. I may simply buy some tokens with them. It's probably the simplest way to help BSC projects.

For tokens on this address, I will ignore them for as long as I can. Doing anything with them requires effort.😂🤷‍♂️

https://t.co/OUOEuB6PYR

复盘一下刚才的操作。首先因为我有jelly的仓位，所以我先思考了一件事情，就是hype如果认输下架jelly的交易对，然后按照下架时的价格进行结算是利空还是利好，毫无疑问这是一个利空，因为hlp的潜在平仓买单没有了

这中间我一直在盯着hlp的仓位，想要观察hlp什么时候开始继续平仓。但是11.06的时候我发现hlp的仓位上显示的mark price开始不随链上价格变化了，这时候我知道hype可能准备认输下架jelly的交易对了。我又继续观察了几分钟，大概确认了hype确实要认输了，然后我这时候卖出了两笔jelly打算获利了结。

然后就是okx突然上了合约，但是我知道这时候已经晚了，hype已经做好了认输的全部准备，所以我加快了卖出的速度。然后就在okx上合约之后，币安上合约之前，hype彻底下架了jelly的交易对，hlp的仓位也自动下架清算了。唯一难受的就是币安上合约之后我知道这肯定是可以做空的，但是我平时不玩合约，第一时间不知道去哪里可以做空。

所以很多新闻说hype是在okx和币安上合约后再下架jelly其实是很不准确的，在okx和币安都没上合约之前hype就已经在准备认输了。

🎯FN 独家丨专访币安创始人赵长鹏：改变人生的四个月

很荣幸独家专访到 @cz_binance  ，借着这次难得的机会， @GetupAnderson  与 CZ 从阿布扎比投资、亲身参与 Meme 新事物、 币安上币策略调整，再到狱中经历体验等方面进行了深度交流，同时也透露了对未来的一些计划，来看看度过人生至暗 4 个月后的 CZ ，究竟发生了哪些变化🫡

📝 核心提炼

🔶 阿布扎比战略入股：
币安选择阿布扎比是因其监管框架与战略定位，而非资金需求。阿联酋的合规环境为币安提供了全球化发展的关键支点。

🔶Meme 币生态：
▪️Meme 币反映社区创造力，但高风险属性显著。
▪️币安支持创新，但需平衡用户教育与风险提示。
▪️特朗普发币：多数名人代币为第三方蹭热度行为，公众人物应专注长期价值项目。

🔶币安上币策略：

▪️币安不能成为大户割韭菜之地，不建议交易所充当「筛选者」角色，看好去中心化交易所（DEX）成为未来主流。
▪️建议项目方公开锁仓机制，采用第三方智能合约增强透明度。

🔶行业发展 ：
▪️从「发币需建链」到 ERC-20 标准，技术门槛降低但核心逻辑未变（社区共识即价值）。
▪️行业需突破金融投机，探索政府身份认证、DeSci 等实际应用。

🔶以太坊与 L2：
▪️错过以太坊投资，但肯定其对 DeFi 的奠基作用。
▪️以太坊当前瓶颈是应用层创新不足，非技术问题。

🔶监狱体验：
▪️4 个月监禁重塑人生优先级，意识到家庭与健康的重要性。
▪️身体减重 6 公斤但更健康，精神压力源于不确定性。

🔶教育项目 Giggle Academic：
▪️旨在通过游戏化学习解决全球教育不平等，培养可增强就业的技能（如 AI 数据标注）。

🔶未来布局：
▪️ 投资方向：聚焦 Web3 基础设施、AI、DeSci（去中心化科学）三大领域。
▪️愿景：扶持千名创业者，打造可持续独角兽项目，重塑行业格局。

支付43亿美元天价罚款 / 高管离职风波/ 上币即终点的VC币/ 天价上币费/ 闺蜜团 / 高估值代币跳水表演等等，都是最近的热点，所以我们用了一周时间来完成这条视频。

bull market made by @binance  continues 🐮 
Besides Meme coins, what AI projects on BNB Chain are worth watching?

ICYMI, western degen might have missed BNB chain's hot growth in the past week

💡BNB CHAIN Weekly Trading Volume Surpasses $15.60 BILLION, exceeding Ethereum by 50%

💡24-Hr DEX Volume: $2.61 Billion, approximately twice as much as Ethereum in second place

Topics covered in this long tweet including:

💡BNB chain's stats skyrocketed this week

💡Hot memecoins associated with Binance alpha and bnbchain asset liquidity pool support campaign

💡 BNB AI Hack Sponsors breakdown

@APRO_Oracle @Unibase_AI @AITECHio @StablesLabs @ASI_Alliance @NetMindAI
💡 Which AI projects support agent creation tutorials?

I've also organized the important timeline of the past two weeks as follows:

- March 13: MGX Abu Dhabi invested $2 billion in Binance, @heyibinance @cz_binance actively engaging with the community 

- March 17: CZ tweeted about wanna change his PFP, seeking community suggestions. On the same day, Binance Wallet announced zero transaction fees for up to half a year! 

- March 18: Binance launched Binance Alpha 2.0, allowing CEX users to directly buy onchain tokens, lowering the threshold between users and on-chain assets. $BMT was listed the same day. 

- March 19: CZ changed his PFP, Binance launched voting campaign

- March 20: $TUT $BID $BROCCOLI714 $BROCCOLIF3B $SIREN $BANANA31 were listed on Binance futures market. 

On the same day, @BinanceWallet launched the Bedrock TGE campaign $BR 

- March 21: @JaneSparking joined Yzi Labs @yzilabs as a general partner, leading Biotech sector investment and incubation

Step by step, we witnessed the active movement of the entire Binance team, not only awakening on-chain momentum but also striking while the iron is hot to promote growth in other sectors as wll, with AI projects being the first among them ✨🤖️

– First, let's review the BNB memes with higher attention these two days

⚡️ actually I mentioned earlier that memecoins on BNB chain generally had low market caps, then we saw CZ mention $BNB Card at Binance Square, which caused it to surge to $20M yday 

⚡️ A few days ago, $BUBB, which @heyibinance followed, even briefly surged to $45M 👀

⚡️ And last night, as @0x0funky mentioned, $LOOM, which was launched on @myshell_ai with official Twitter interaction, also reached a Mcap of $8M in a short time, clearly breaking through the market cap ceiling of the past few days

Today, $QUQ and $TAT were successively listed on BN alpha, with peak market caps around $15M and $8M respectively

I noticed that the second round of the permanent liquidity support competition hosted on @DappBayBNB  had ended, and this might be related to subsequent listings on BN alpha, worth keeping an eye on 👀

Event page: https://t.co/BBehMZ1qHv

The winners of this liquidity-pool-support campaign will enjoy a liquidity injection of $4.4M, participants were divided into two categories: 

Burst Zone and Mature Zone

Burst Zone top 5 (limited to below $20M market cap):

$BUBB (not yet included in Binance alpha) 
$TAT (included today) 
$BNB CARD (included yesterday) 
$PATLU (not yet included in Binance alpha) $MUBARAKAH (already included in Binance alpha)

Mature Zone top 5 (limited to above $20M market cap):

$MGC 
$ICECREAM 
$BABYMORE 
$BR 
$HOPE

The ranking for this event is mainly based on "market cap," "price increase," and "trading volume"

This also explains why everyone says it's an artificial bull market cuz pumping can lead to good rankings 

Not only launching zero-fee campaign but also stimulating buying power and community building activities - that's why Binance is impressive!

Now, what projects should we focused on rn regarding AI sector?

start from sponsors at BNB AI Hack this time, Let's dive in! 

1️⃣ @APRO_Oracle is the team I'm most familiar with. I previously knew them from one of the BTCFi side event.

Even though btcfi has cooled down somewhat, they continue shipping and are also got selected at MVB 8.

This year, the team has moved towards the AI field, launching #ATTPs (AgentText Transfer Protocol Secure), currently integrating deepseek, Eliza , Virtuals's G.A.M.E framework, etc., planning to create an infra for information transmission in the ai agent market

Particularly important is verifiability as I mentioned when introducing @nillionnetwork previously. 

they're currently working with BNB Greenfield, with other partners including @PhalaNetwork and @mindnetwork_xyz

You can see this tweet also mentions the recently popular MCP (Model Context Protocol). 

AI oracle will be an important infra for the next explosion of agentic market, worth keeping an eye on it

https://t.co/5DhZ1qy3uL

2️⃣Unibase @Unibase_AI aims to build a decentralized AI memory layer, they also mentioned on-chain verifiability and privacy (based on zk), allowing anyone to easily build AI applications
Yesterday they announced support for MCP, indicating that AI agents can collaborate with multiple agents on BNB Chain, including knowledge sharing, identity verification, etc.
Unibase's partners include @Zypher_Network @yai_erc and others

3️⃣
@AITECHio is an old project since 2021 from the data shows on Root Data

they're seeking teams to build AI-based data analysis, investment strategies, automated trading agents this time

$AITECH has already issued tokens with a market cap of $63M, not much momentum though

they've made quite a few products in the pase, mainly around AI and computing power marketplace, as well as services like Avachat and even have their own launchpad. 

However, the first and only one $VIA down bad for the past few months

4️⃣ @StablesLabs is a rising star in the recent stablecoin sector, also the issuer of USDX. 

Currently, USDX's TVL ranks tenth overall with a TVL of $620 million

USDX is a Delta-neutral synthetic stablecoin

#BNBChain Completes Pascal Hard Fork

🔸This fork introduced the EIP-7702 Smart Contract Wallet, enhancing EVM compatibility and developer support with:
- Gas fee abstraction
- Smart payment interface
- Batch transactions

🔸Upcoming Upgrades:

- Lorentz Upgrade (April 2025): Reduces block time to 1.5s for faster transactions.
- Maxwell Upgrade (June 2025): Further reduces block time to 0.75s for increased efficiency.

@BNBChain’s roadmap focuses on scalability and performance improvements. 🚀
